tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Trigger Stage
type: Tutorial Step - Let's Study the Syntax!

definition.text: The syntax to write conditions and formulas follows a few basic rules that will soon seem obvious!

paragraphs.text: It may take some time to master the syntax, particularly if you are not a technical person, but experience shows that Superalgos users get used to it while building their first strategy!
Don't worry if it seems hard to grasp... We'll practice a lot along this tutorial series!
